definition[0]: complementary things go well together, although they are usually different
example[0]: The computer and the human mind have different but complementary abilities.
definition[1]: complementary colours of light are very different and combine to make white
definition[2]: two angles that are complementary add up to 90 degrees
definition[3]: sold or used with other products
example[1]: complementary goods, for example videocassettes and videorecorders
